doc.title: Conditional Love
doc.plot: A mother of three grown children wins the lottery and offers to give each of her children two million dollars,with one stipulation. Before they can collect the money, they must change their current lives to meet her specifications and beliefs of what their lives should be. Products of a perpetually dysfunctional family, the three siblings must each make the decision to change their lives as their mother sees fit in order to collect the money and a chance at the "good life" or live their lives on their own terms,for better or worse.
